name: 旅人
description:
《旅人》的無選項電子小故事。
Beta version，是學習Ren'py的產物 (?)

this is a super short visual novel  without any choices and my first visual novel with Ren'py.  it's more like an exercise than a developed game.  but still, I'm happy with the out come.   Will try to make a longer  visual novel (with choices) later when I have more free time. 

Traditional Chinese only.
